task: Install the latest Office 365 by July 13th, 2025 at 17:30.
comments: This is a transition from WPS to Microsoft Office as mentioned by the project manager.
email_content:
Dear All

As we already moved from WPS to MicroSoft Office, all shall install the
latest Office 365 by today (17:30 July 13th 2025).

Please make sure to activate it with our public account and don't use your
personal account. if you don't have our public account key, please forward
this email to IT department and ask them for it.

Best regards
Lisa Torrello
Project Manager
